attributes.action: Dissmis the EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum petition.
attributes.additional_details:
With the EU referendum’s turnout representing a figure just shy of the 1992 general election a sufficient portion of the population voted (Electorate 46,501,24).

51.9%, 17,410,742 voted leave.

The public decision has been made and on the world stage.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to dismiss the petition to rule that if the remain or leave vote is less than 60% based a turnout less than 75% there should be another referendum.
